name: Nardakka
content:
Nardakka was a Wookiee who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Nardakka worked as a courier for the criminal Vex and during the time of the Clone Wars, was among a group of couriers that were sent by Vex to collect an illicit cargo in the jungles of the planet Cularin. However, they were ambushed by thugs working for the Hutt Riboga. Nardakka was killed when the thugs detonated a thermal mine.
